00053 static int logic_properties(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00054 {
00055     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00056     ARegion *ar= logic_has_buttons_region(sa);
00057     
00058     if (ar)
00059         ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, ar);
00060 
00061     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void LOGIC_OT_properties(wmOperatorType *ot)
00065 {
00066     ot->name = "Properties";
00067     ot->description = "Toggle display properties panel";
00068     ot->idname = "LOGIC_OT_properties";
00069     
00070     ot->exec = logic_properties;
00071     ot->poll = ED_operator_logic_active;
00072     
00073     /* flags */
00074     ot->flag = 0;
00075 }
00076 
00077 /* Remove Logic Bricks Connections */
00078 /* ********************** Cut Link operator ***************** */
00079 
00080 #define LINK_RESOL 12
00081 static int cut_links_intersect(uiLinkLine *line, float mcoords[][2], int tot)
00082 {
00083     float coord_array[LINK_RESOL+1][2];
00084     int i, b;
00085     rcti rectlink;
00086 
00087     rectlink.xmin = (int) (line->from->x1 + line->from->x2) / 2;
00088     rectlink.ymin = (int) (line->from->y1 + line->from->y2) / 2;
00089     rectlink.xmax = (int) (line->to->x1 + line->to->x2) / 2;
00090     rectlink.ymax = (int) (line->to->y1 + line->to->y2) / 2;
00091 
00092     if (ui_link_bezier_points(&rectlink, coord_array, LINK_RESOL)) {
00093         for (i=0; i<tot-1; i++)
00094             for (b=0; b<LINK_RESOL-1; b++)
00095                 if (isect_line_line_v2(mcoords[i], mcoords[i+1], coord_array[b], coord_array[b+1]) > 0)
00096                     return 1;
00097     }
00098     return 0;
00099 }
00100 
00101 static int cut_links_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00102 {
00103     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00104     float mcoords[256][2];
00105     int i= 0;
00106     
00107     RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "path") {
00108         float loc[2];
00109         
00110         RNA_float_get_array(&itemptr, "loc", loc);
00111         UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, (short)loc[0], (short)loc[1], 
00112                                  &mcoords[i][0], &mcoords[i][1]);
00113         i++;
00114         if (i>= 256) break;
00115     }
00116     RNA_END;
00117 
00118     if (i>1) {
00119         uiBlock *block;
00120         uiLinkLine *line, *nline;
00121         uiBut *but;
00122         for (block= ar->uiblocks.first; block; block= block->next)
00123         {
00124             but= block->buttons.first;
00125             while (but) {
00126                 if (but->type==LINK && but->link) {
00127                     for (line= but->link->lines.first; line; line= nline) {
00128                         nline= line->next;
00129 
00130                         if (cut_links_intersect(line, mcoords, i)) {
00131                             ui_delete_linkline(line, but);
00132                         }
00133                     }
00134                 }
00135                 but= but->next;
00136             }
00137         }
00138         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00139     }   
00140     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED|OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00141 }
00142 
00143 void LOGIC_OT_links_cut(wmOperatorType *ot)
00144 {
00145     PropertyRNA *prop;
00146     
00147     ot->name = "Cut links";
00148     ot->idname = "LOGIC_OT_links_cut";
00149     ot->description = "Remove logic brick connections";
00150     
00151     ot->invoke = WM_gesture_lines_invoke;
00152     ot->modal = WM_gesture_lines_modal;
00153     ot->exec = cut_links_exec;
00154     ot->cancel = WM_gesture_lines_cancel;
00155     
00156     ot->poll = ED_operator_logic_active;
00157     
00158     /* flags */
00159     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00160     
00161     prop= RNA_def_property(ot->srna, "path", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
00162     RNA_def_property_struct_runtime(prop, &RNA_OperatorMousePath);
00163     /* internal */
00164     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "cursor", BC_KNIFECURSOR, 0, INT_MAX, "Cursor", "", 0, INT_MAX);
00165 }
